care_instructions.watering: Keep soil consistently moist but not waterlogged. Mist leaves regularly to increase humidity.
care_instructions.light: Bright, indirect light. Protection from harsh afternoon sun.
care_instructions.soil: Rich, well-draining potting mix with plenty of organic matter.
care_instructions.fertilizing: Apply balanced liquid fertilizer every 2-4 weeks during growing season.

timeline.action: Winter maintenance. Keep away from cold drafts and maintain humidity.
Beginning of growth cycle. Good time for repotting if needed.
Active growth period. Monitor for pests in warmer weather.
Growth slows. Reduce watering and fertilizing frequency.
